message: Let's be fair, I start with 60-40
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. How about a slightly more balanced split this time?
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
The clock is ticking, Alice. This offer is fair and we both lose if this drags on.
Getting closer, but I still need a bit more
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  50/50 is the only fair deal at this point. Take it or leave it!
